data.prayer: Father, help the 1,702 believers in Nakhon Nayok to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 261,498 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nakhon Nayok, Thailand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 98.69 percent of the people of Nakhon Nayok are far from Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Nakhon Nayok, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Nakhon Nayok, Thailand. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Spirit, help the 1,702 believers in Nakhon Nayok to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Spirit, encourage the church in Nakhon Nayok, Thailand to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,702 believers in Nakhon Nayok to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
